revised_title: Investigating the Radio-Activity of Uranium and its Minerals
tldr: The author investigates the radioactivity of uranium and its minerals, discovering that pitchblende is the most active mineral and that the action of pitchblende is proportional to the percentage of uranium in the mineral. The study also reveals that the radioactivity does not pass through much thickness of active material and that uranium and thorium are the only practically active elements.
